h2_title: Where To Use Blood of the Iron Bull in Black Myth: Wukong
h1_content: Blood of the Iron Bull is one of the rarest and most important Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong. They are vital for upgrading all your Spirits and powering them up to their maximum level. Blood of the Iron Bull can be found throughout the game in various locations, so you will always be stumbling upon them while defeating Yaoguai Kings, Chiefs, and bosses.
h2_content:
Blood of the Iron Bull materials can be used at the Shrines to upgrade your Spirits. Higher upgrades for them require more Blood of the Iron Bull materials, so it is important to find as many as you can.
If you are keen to know which Spirits you should level up, be sure to check out our guide on the best Spirits to use") in the game, and for all their locations, visit our page on the Spirit Locations.
